message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but $110 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I can't go as low as $90, but I'm willing to come down to $100. This is my final offer, so let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $100, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but $92 is still below what I can accept. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $96. If you're serious about buying the product, this is our last chance to come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $94 for the product. Can you reconsider?
